function of getting PRE from F

```{r}
#  df1 = pa - pc
#  df2 <- n - pa

qpre <- function(p, df1, df2) {
  
  f <- qf(p = p,
          df1 = df1,
          df2 = df2)
  
  crit_pre <- f / (f + df2/df1)
  
  return(crit_pre)
}

qpre(p = 0.95, df1 = 1, df2 = 99)
```
